text:
Hi,

I added a user to my manager app, with role "manager-gui", and the password contains & symbol, the user was not logging in!

I checked logs, I found exceptions relates to part of the password after the "&" symbol

tomcat-users.xml is an XML file.

The '&' character is a reserved character in XML files must, therefore, be escaped when used.
